item.description:
Lets all head out to another fun place and kick back and enjoy a few laughs, dances, and listen to  some great tunes. This band rocks to some amazing tunes, a little bit of everything top 40's, believe me you will be up there boogying. I will get there for a  dinner around 7:30 and reserve a table under my name Eva so if there are any new people who want to join us just have the hostess point you to my table. Please include in your RSVP if you will have dinner or just dancing. 

Whippers has a decor of a Sports bar with a huge lounge area, several flat screens as well. Dress code is casual.  

 This Meet Up is combined with three other groups

Band - Radio Edit (radioeditband.boston)

STart Time 9pm

My cell 978-857-6626
item.how_to_find_us: Ask the hostess for Eva's table.

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Dinner and Dancing with a Great Group of Fun People
